definitions.body: lit. arise Da 3:24 (i.e. from throne), Da 6:20 (from bed).
fig. = come on the scene of history: of kingdom Da 2:39, king Da 7:17, Da 7:24 (both [[מִן]] of source), v:Da 7:24.
arise (out of inaction), and build Ezr 5:2, devour Da 7:5.
stand, lit., [[לָקֳבֵל]] pers. Da 2:31, cf. Da 3:3, [[קֳדָם]] pers. Da 7:10; pt. as n., those standing (there) v:Da 7:16.

definitions.title: Pa.
definitions.body: set up, establish an ordinance ([[קְיׇם]]): Inf. [[לְקַיׇּמָה]] Da 6:8.
set up, lit. image Da 3:1, Da 3:2, Da 3:3, Da 3:3, Da 3:5, Da 3:7, Da 3:12, Da 3:14, Da 3:18; fig. kings Da 2:21, kingdom v:Da 2:44.
lift up one side Da 7:5 a (Dr).
appoint Ezr 6:18, 2 acc. Da 5:11; sf. pers. + [[עַל]] Da 6:4, [[ל]] acc. pers. + [[עַל]] Da 4:14, Da 5:21, Da 6:2.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הֳקִימַת]] (variants in Str; cf. K:§ 45, 5; not Hebraism Nö:GGA 1867, 1784; W:CG 225, 253) Da 7:4 be made to stand [[עַלרַגְיִן]].
